On the obverse is Archimedes and a quote attributed to 1st century AD poet Manilius which reads in English As ##s et et meaning To surpass ones understanding and master the world
The year number 1933 is written in Roman numerals and contains an error MCNXXXIII rather than MCMXXXIII
In capital Greek letters the word Ἀρχιμηδους or of Archimedes is inscribed

The year number 1933 is written in Roman numerals with an error.
The word  is written in Greek in capital letters.

On the reverse is the inscriptionCongregatiex toto orbemathematiciob scripta insigniatribuereTranslation Mathematicians gathered from the entire world have awarded understood but not written this prize for outstanding writings
